entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this afternoon except snow over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
